channel.title: HOME on Mark Marquez
channel.description: Recent content in HOME on Mark Marquez

item.title: VC Funding Scrap and Store
item.description: VC Funding Scrap and Store Overall Project Goals Analyzing data on new funding rounds and venture-funded companies, helping teams maximize the ROI of their new innovations / markets by: Collecting data on venture funding rounds and the venture-funded companies. Cleaning/formatting the collected data and sorting it by funding date and time. Storing information into various datatypes such as excel, csv and SQL. Abstract With data that is sourced from the website ‘VCNewsDaily’, this project collects information on new venture funding rounds, along with the details on the funding round and the venture-funded companies.

item.title: Real Estate Price Predictor - Kaggle Build
item.description: Real Estate Price Predictor - Kaggle Rebuild Project Goals Analyzing data on historical real estate sales to help a potential buyer find undervalued properties by: Analyzing and exploring how the general real estate market is broken down (i.e., price, square feet, stories) Analyze how different house features effect sale prices for houses Predict the price of sale of a house based on features and location Abstract Through a dataset provided by Kaggle for a data science competition, this project analyzes real estate data in the Boston market to help a potential home buyer maximize the ROI of their new home purchase.

item.title: KPMG Virtual Internship - Bike Shop Marketing ROI
item.description: Using CRM Data to Identify Ideal Customer Profiles and Predict New Sales Abstract: Through a dataset provided by KPMG, an Australian bicycle shop owner was looking to maximize their marketing ROI by analyzing data on their customers and transactions for the past 3 years. This was accomplished by developing customer profiles based on data, along with predicting new sales that referenced data on previous transactions and customer demographics. Results provided a data-driven ideal customer profile, along with a baseline predictive model for customers that have been in the CRM for longer than 3 years.

item.title: LA County Sociodemographic Clustering - Coursera Capstone
item.description: Project Summary Through a dataset provided by the US government, cities in LA County will be grouped into clusters based on sociodemographic scores to develop benchmarks for each cluster. This will help city officials identify what are the biggest areas for improvement based on cluster (i.e., mental health to upper-class vs school quality to lower-class). Along with mapping out LA County based on socioeconomic clusters to help identify potential visual patterns.

item.description: Within any page, you can add in the FrontMatter a images array that will be used to define a specific Open Graph image. For example, see content/_index.md page:

item.title: FUNNEL OPTIMIZATION
item.description: Constantly measures conversion rates throughout the lead generation funnel (i.e., cold connects to calls set) in order to focus on the area that will have the greatest returns (i.e., low email response rates). Excels at using sales technology (i.e., SalesForce), data, and statistics to track and predict lead flow. Leverages best practices developed by industry experts and internal team resources by creating SDR playbooks that include ideal client profiles, outreach messaging (i.

item.title: LEAD GENERATION
item.description: Leverages best practices in cold-calling, email and social media in order to maximize all new leads coming in from the top of the [lead generation] funnel. Leverages systemic outbound approaches, via account-based prospecting, in order to engage various levels of the organizations with their key goals in mind. Outbound outreach includes anywhere between 8-14 steps, with messaging tailored towards different goals at each touch point, to maximize interactions and provide commercial insight that opens up future conversation.

item.title: LEAD SOURCING
item.description: Uses lead sourcing to predictably add new leads to the top of the lead generation funnel. Pays very close attention to the number of new leads entering the pipeline, along with the quality of each lead. Takes note of stakeholder(s), industry and/or use case to proactively reach out to similar prospects via outbound outreach. Very cost-effective at leveraging and combining lead sourcing and sales technology. Constantly up-to-date with market activity and always refining lead sourcing strategy accordingly.
